code: import{useEffect}from'react';import history from'routerHistory';var useScrollOnRouteChange=function useScrollOnRouteChange(){useEffect(function(){var unlisten=history.listen(function(args){if(args.hash===''){setTimeout(function(){window.scroll({top:0,left:0,behavior:'smooth'});},50);}});return function(){return unlisten();};},[]);};export default useScrollOnRouteChange;
